name: Kirna. Third season
description:
After an unknown object falls to Earth, a group of people is sent to it. The first scientist who touches an alien artifact disappears with him and shakes consciousness. After the scientist came to his senses, he finds himself in the alien television show Kirna in which he will undergo tests for the fun of aliens.

A total of 1 level is ready, 2 levels are being finalized.
